verses.t: Paul{G3972}, an apostle{G652} of Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547} by{G1223} the will{G2307} of God{G2316}, and{G2532} Timothy{G5095} our brother{G3588}, unto the church{G3588} of God{G3588} which is{G5607} at{G1722} Corinth{G2882}, with{G4862} all{G3956} the saints{G40} which are{G5607} in{G1722} all{G3650} Achaia{G3588}:
Grace{G5485} be to you{G5213} and{G2532} peace{G1515} from{G575} God{G2316} our{G2257} Father{G3962}, and{G2532} from the Lord{G2962} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547}.

Blessed{G2128} be God{G3588}, even{G2532} the Father{G3962} of our{G2257} Lord{G3588} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547}, the Father{G3588} of mercies{G3588}, and{G2532} the God{G2316} of all{G3956} comfort{G3874};

For{G3754} as{G2531} the sufferings{G3588} of Christ{G3588} abound{G4052} in{G1519} us{G2248}, so{G3779} our{G2257} consolation{G3588} also{G2532} aboundeth{G4052} by{G1223} Christ{G5547}.

And{G1161} whether{G1535} we be afflicted{G2346}, it is for{G5228} your{G5216} consolation{G3874} and{G2532} salvation{G4991}, which{G3588} is effectual{G1754} in{G1722} the enduring{G5281} of the same{G846} sufferings{G3804} which{G3739} we{G2249} also{G2532} suffer{G3958}: or whether{G1535} we be comforted{G3870}, it is for{G5228} your{G5216} consolation{G3874} and{G2532} salvation{G4991}NOTE! The extra tags "kai","n","elpis", "hemon","bebaios", "hupper","humon" Belong in the next verse!

And our hope of you is stedfast, knowing{G1492}, that{G3754} as{G5618} ye are{G2075} partakers{G2844} of the sufferings{G3588}, so{G3779} shall ye be also{G2532} of the consolation{G3588}.NOTE! "elpis" "bebaios" and other Greek tags are somehow in verse sixes' tags.

For{G1063} we would{G2309} not{G3756}, brethren{G80}, have{G50} you{G5209} ignorant{G50} of{G5228} our{G2257} trouble{G3588} which came{G1096} to us{G2254} in{G1722} Asia{G3588}, that{G3754} we were pressed{G916} out{G2596} of measure{G5236}, above{G5228} strength{G1411}, insomuch that{G5620} we{G2248} despaired{G1820} even{G2532} of life{G2198}:

But{G235} we{G846} had{G2192} the sentence{G3588} of death{G3588} in{G1722} ourselves{G1438}, that{G2443} we should{G5600} not{G3361} trust{G3982} in{G1909} ourselves{G1438}, but{G235} in{G1909} God{G3588} which{G3588} raiseth{G1453} the dead{G3498}:

Who{G3739} delivered{G4506} us{G2248} from{G1537} so great{G5082} a death{G2288}, and{G2532} doth deliver{G4506}: in{G1519} whom{G3739} we trust{G1679} that{G3754} he will{G4506} yet{G2089} deliver{G4506} us;

Ye{G5216} also{G2532} helping together{G4943} by prayer{G3588} for{G5228} us{G2257}, that{G2443} for the gift{G5486} bestowed upon{G1519} us{G2248} by the means of{G1537} many{G4183} persons{G4383} thanks may be given{G2168} by{G1223} many{G4183} on{G5228} our behalf{G2257}.

For{G1063} our{G2257} rejoicing{G2746} is{G2076} this{G3778}, the testimony{G3588} of our{G2257} conscience{G3588}, that{G3754} in{G1722} simplicity{G572} and{G2532} godly{G2316} sincerity{G1505}, not{G3756} with{G1722} fleshly{G4559} wisdom{G4678}, but{G235} by{G1722} the grace{G5485} of God{G2316}, we have had our conversation{G390} in{G1722} the world{G3588}, and{G1161} more abundantly{G4056} to{G4314} you-ward{G5209}.

For{G1063} we write{G1125} none{G3756} other things{G243} unto you{G5213}, than{G235} what{G3739} ye read{G314} or{G2228} acknowledge{G1921}; and{G1161} I trust{G1679} ye shall acknowledge{G1921} even{G2532} to{G2193} the end{G5056};

As{G2531} also{G2532} ye have acknowledged{G1921} us{G2248} in{G575} part{G3313}, that{G3754} we are{G2070} your{G5216} rejoicing{G2745}, even as{G2509} ye{G5210} also{G2532} are ours{G2257} in{G1722} the day{G3588} of the Lord{G3588} Jesus{G2424}.
And{G2532} in this{G3778} confidence{G3588} I was minded{G1014} to come{G2064} unto{G4314} you{G5209} before{G4386}, that{G2443} ye might have{G2192} a second{G1208} benefit{G5485};

And{G2532} to pass{G1330} by{G1223} you{G5216} into{G1519} Macedonia{G3109}, and{G2532} to come{G2064} again{G3825} out of{G575} Macedonia{G3109} unto{G4314} you{G5209}, and{G2532} of{G5259} you{G5216} to be brought on my way{G4311} toward{G1519} Judaea{G3588}.

When I therefore{G3767} was{G1011} thus{G5124} minded{G1011}, did{G3361} I use{G5530} lightness{G3588}? or{G2228} the things{G3739}that I purpose{G1011}, do I purpose{G1011} according to{G2596} the flesh{G4561}, that{G2443} with{G3844} me{G1698} there should be{G5600} yea{G3483} yea{G3483}, and{G2532} nay{G3756} nay{G3756}?
But{G1161} as God{G3588} is true{G4103}, our{G2257} word{G3588} toward{G4314} you{G5209} was{G1096} not{G3756} yea{G3483} and{G2532} nay{G3756}.

For{G1063} all{G3745} the promises{G1860} of God{G2316} in{G1722} him{G846} are yea{G3483}, and{G2532} in{G1722} him{G846} Amen{G281}, unto{G4314} the glory{G1391} of God{G3588} by{G1223} us{G2257}.
Now{G1161} he which{G3588} stablisheth{G950} us{G2248} with{G4862} you{G5213} in{G1519} Christ{G5547}, and{G2532} hath anointed{G5548} us{G2248}, is God{G2316};
Who{G3588} hath{G4972} also{G2532} sealed{G4972} us{G2248}, and{G2532} given{G1325} the earnest{G3588} of the Spirit{G3588} in{G1722} our{G2257} hearts{G3588}.

Moreover{G1161} I{G1473} call{G1941} God{G3588} for a record{G3144} upon{G1909} my{G1699} soul{G5590}, that{G3754} to spare{G5339} you{G5216} I came{G2064} not as yet{G3765} unto{G1519} Corinth{G2882}.
Not{G3756} for that{G3754} we have dominion{G2961} over your{G5216} faith{G3588}, but{G235} are{G2070} helpers{G4904} of your{G5216} joy{G3588}: for{G1063} by faith{G4102} ye stand{G2476}.
